articles.title: A Gentleman's Guide On How To Navigate Hookups
articles.excerpt: Hookups are a common culture in modern dating, but navigating them can be a dangerous path to walk. The HiM Journal gentlemen will guide you how to be the bad boy who gets what he wants.

articles.title: My Rear Derailleur Got Broken, Here is What I Did
articles.excerpt: A broken read derailleur doesn't need to mean an end to your cycling trip. Learn from Scouts and Be Ready for emergencies with these mechanical skills at the most inconvenient moments.
